actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate as wilderness certain lands within the Chiricahua National Monument in the State of Arizona.

summary.text: Designates as wilderness specified lands, comprising approximately 9,440 acres, within the Chiricahua National Monument in the State of Arizona.

titles.title: A bill to designate as wilderness certain lands within the Chiricahua National Monument in the State of Arizona.
